title: US used Anthropic’s Claude AI model in Venezuela raid that captured Maduro: Report
summary_full: Anthropic's AI model Claude was reportedly used in the US military operation that captured former Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro. The mission involved bombing sites in Caracas, with Maduro apprehended in an early January raid. This deployment highlights growing questions about AI's role in military contexts, despite Anthropic's usage policies prohibiting violence facilitation.
